Articles.Content:
I've just uploaded my third Kerbal Absurdities video, check it out

This thing was one of the ideas I thunk (I officially declare that a word now) up in class, and it did NOT behave as expected, which, of course, resulted in the monstrosity of a video that is the Really Tall Thingy.

I hope you guys enjoy! I know that I do. Especially in reading any and all comments people post, that really gives me hope to move forward.

Thanks a million!

-Maximus97

I like it. *Thumbs up*

I might know a way to make a stable one, too. I'll let you know.
